Acts of Apostles__21.8__The evangelist: That is, the preacher of the gospel; the same that before converted the Samaritans, and baptized the eunuch, chap. 8., being one of the first seven deacons.
Acts of Apostles__21.24__Keeping the law: The law, though now no longer obligatory, was for a time observed by the Christian Jewsto bury, as it were, the synagogue with honour.
